name: AnotherEarth
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modification：

  1. Additional art material has been added to create two scenes that are not just about fighting in space.
  2. More elements have been added to the menu page to make it more lively and interesting
  3. A lot of new gameplay has been added to the battles as well, (e.g. the second ice crush)
  4. The game now has a full play sequence as well as a story to make the game's plot even richer.

There are many new elements to discover for yourself. I hope you enjoy the game!

Remember to check out the instructions before you play! Each level needs to be cleared of all enemies in order to progress to the next level.

If you find any bugs in the process of playing or want to make any comments, please feel free to point them out in the comments section or contact me :)

Credits

Create by Chris
